actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to permit the exchange of five-year level premium term policies of National Service Life Insurance to special endowment at age ninety-six plans.

summary.text: Permits an insured veteran upon reaching the age of 65 to exchange a five-year level premium term policy of National Service Life Insurance to a special endowment at age 96 plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to permit the exchange of five-year level premium term policies of National Service Life Insurance to special endowment at age ninety-six plans.
